title: Can we have NFS support in all versions of Windows?
body: Starting in Windows 10, NFS support was moved to Enterprise edition which is practically impossible to purchase as an individual.

comments.body: I second this request. I really would appreciate NFS support inside WSL so that I can use NFS file sync between my WSL host and my Vagrant VMs.
This was mentioned and incorrectly marked "COMPLETED". Unfortunately, it seems we must re-vote this up and clarify that many of us need it to work directly within Windows Subsystem of Linux (WSL).
